-- mock_data.sql
-- Purpose: Populate Supabase database for Oil & Gas GenAI Demo with sample data
-- Tables: wells, parts, inventory, faults, fault_embeddings, chat_history
-- Requirements: 30 wells, 15 parts, 3 warehouses, 150 faults, and sample chat history
-- Notes: Fault embeddings are placeholders (generated by Cohere Embed v4 in practice)
--        Run after creating tables as defined in datamodel.md

-- Enable pgvector extension for fault_embeddings
CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS vector;

-- Clear existing data
TRUNCATE TABLE chat_history, fault_embeddings, faults, inventory, parts, wells CASCADE;

-- Insert 30 wells in Permian Basin (Midland, Delaware camps; Wolfcamp, Spraberry, Bone Spring formations)
INSERT INTO wells (id, name, camp, formation, latitude, longitude, status, last_maintenance, fault_details) VALUES

-- Insert 15 parts
INSERT INTO parts (part_id, name, description, specifications, manufacturer) VALUES
  ('P001', 'Centrifugal Pump', 'High-pressure pump for fluid transfer', '{"pressure": "5000 psi", "flow_rate": "1000 gpm"}', 'Schlumberger'),
  ('P002', 'Pressure Sensor', 'Monitors well pressure', '{"range": "0-10000 psi", "accuracy": "0.5%"}', 'Halliburton'),
  ('P003', 'Control Valve', 'Regulates fluid flow', '{"size": "4 inch", "material": "stainless steel"}', 'Baker Hughes'),
  ('P004', 'Electric Motor', 'Powers pump systems', '{"power": "50 hp", "voltage": "480V"}', 'GE Oil & Gas'),
  ('P005', 'Flow Meter', 'Measures fluid flow rate', '{"range": "0-2000 gpm", "accuracy": "1%"}', 'Emerson'),
  ('P006', 'Temperature Sensor', 'Monitors well temperature', '{"range": "-40-300Â°F", "accuracy": "0.2%"}', 'Honeywell'),
  ('P007', 'Safety Valve', 'Prevents overpressure', '{"rating": "10000 psi", "type": "spring-loaded"}', 'Cameron'),
  ('P008', 'Hydraulic Pump', 'Drives hydraulic systems', '{"pressure": "3000 psi", "flow": "50 gpm"}', 'Weatherford'),
  ('P009', 'Check Valve', 'Prevents backflow', '{"size": "3 inch", "material": "carbon steel"}', 'Schlumberger'),
  ('P010', 'Level Sensor', 'Monitors fluid levels', '{"range": "0-100 ft", "accuracy": "0.1%"}', 'Halliburton'),
  ('P011', 'Gearbox', 'Transmits power to pumps', '{"ratio": "5:1", "torque": "1000 Nm"}', 'Baker Hughes'),
  ('P012', 'Actuator', 'Controls valve operations', '{"type": "pneumatic", "force": "5000 N"}', 'Emerson'),
  ('P013', 'Pressure Regulator', 'Maintains stable pressure', '{"range": "100-5000 psi", "type": "diaphragm"}', 'Honeywell'),
  ('P014', 'Submersible Pump', 'Pumps fluid from deep wells', '{"depth": "5000 ft", "flow": "800 gpm"}', 'GE Oil & Gas'),
  ('P015', 'Vibration Sensor', 'Detects equipment vibrations', '{"range": "0-50 mm/s", "sensitivity": "100 mV/g"}', 'Cameron');

-- Insert fault_embeddings (placeholders, actual embeddings generated by Cohere Embed v4)
-- For each fault, insert a placeholder vector (1024 zeros, to be updated by Edge Function)
INSERT INTO fault_embeddings (fault_id, embedding)
SELECT fault_id, '[0]'::vector(1024)
FROM faults;
